name: Otaku Puzzle
description:
Otaku Puzzle is a 3D top-down Puzzle Game!!

You can solve puzzles by yourself, or with your friends, and the puzzles can be anything you want!!

Otaku Puzzle supports YouTube videos, regular video files, GIFs, any picture files, and even random searches! Start puzzling!

FEATURES
  • Singleplayer and Co-Op!!
  • Anything on the puzzle you want, upload, use a URL, or type in any term!! (Yes, VIDEOS & GIFS!!)
  • Full chat working with multiplayer to yell at friends!!
  • Customizable interface, music, & more! Set your own background and launch screen!!
  • 6 different environments to solve puzzles in!!
  • And more features, like puzzle hints, camera angles, etc!! Have fun!!

Who knew that solving puzzles could be so fun!!

What are you waiting for!! Solve a puzzle over the internet with your buddy!! Or alone!!
